brand.name: Timekettle
brand.tagline: AI-driven translation devices that help people understand each other instantly.

default.title: Timekettle | AI translation earbuds and simultaneous interpreting solutions

intro.title: Making the world instantly understood
intro.subtitle: Timekettle Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2016 in Shenzhen’s Nanshan District. Our teams across speech science, acoustics, algorithms, and industrial design focus on breakthroughs in cross-language communication.

media.alt: Illustration of Timekettle teams collaborating around AI translation interfaces

items.title: Mission
items.description: Combine AI and hardware to remove language barriers for people everywhere.

items.title: Vision
items.description: Lead the global market for translation earbuds and cross-language technologies.

items.title: Core values
items.description: Communication creates connection, user value first, innovation for the long term.
Timekettle launches in Shenzhen with its first real-time translation prototype and the belief that communication creates connection.
Zero pocket translator debuts for travelers, surpassing 50,000 users worldwide.
W3 flagship translation earbuds arrive, bringing wearable simultaneous interpreting to business and education.
W4 Pro and the X1 platform roll out as industry customers pass 4,300 across 171+ countries.
Babel OS 2.0 launches, monthly translation characters exceed one billion, and global media attention continues to grow.

team.title: Leadership and teams
team.description: Led by CEO Leal Tian, our interdisciplinary team spans speech recognition, chip design, industrial design, and global operations to bring products from China to the world.

recognition.title: Global recognition
items: Winner of CES Innovation Awards, iF Design Award, and China Red Star Award
Featured by BBC, The New York Times, Forbes, TechCrunch, and more as a “sci-fi like product”
Shipped to 171+ countries and ranked #1 worldwide in the translation earbud category

experience.title: Experience centers
experience.description: Schedule a visit to our Shenzhen headquarters or connect with authorized partners worldwide for hands-on demos and enterprise consultation.

careers.title: Careers
careers.description: We are hiring across speech algorithms, hardware engineering, product design, and international go-to-market—join us to shape the future of cross-language communication.

intro.title: Product ecosystem
intro.subtitle: Comprehensive solutions built around earbuds, translators, and platform services.

media.alt: Diagram of Timekettle translation ecosystem connecting devices and software

items.title: W4 Translation Earbuds
items.description: Wearable translation for travel and social encounters with instant captions and voice playback.

items.title: W4 Pro Business Kit
items.description: Dual-ear interpreting with shared captions across devices, ideal for meetings, training, and hosted events.

items.title: Zero Pocket Translator
items.description: Plug-and-play translator with a four-microphone array, perfect for on-the-go conversations.

items.title: T1 Portable Interpreter
items.description: A handheld device with dual microphones and a dedicated screen for business receptions and public service counters.

items.title: X1 AI Translation Hub
items.description: Manage devices, corpora, and accounts from one console with APIs, terminology sync, and meeting minutes.

items.title: Multilingual classroom solution
items.description: Combine earbuds and caption displays to support schools and training organizations with multi-language teaching.

items.title: Babel OS 2.0
items.description: End-to-end speech recognition, noise suppression, and machine translation with synchronized device upgrades.

items.title: Domain terminology center
items.description: Import enterprise glossaries and scenario vocabularies to maintain brand consistency.

items.title: Global after-sales support
items.description: Service coverage across 171+ countries with remote diagnostics and local maintenance partners.

intro.title: Case studies
intro.subtitle: Timekettle delivers measurable impact across business, tourism, education, and public service.

items.title: Multinational business summits
items.description: Deploying W4 Pro for a 500-attendee conference delivered 95% caption accuracy and smoother exchanges.

items.title: International classrooms
items.description: Schools in Shenzhen and Los Angeles rely on our classroom solution to keep international students in sync with lessons.

items.title: Smart tourism guidance
items.description: Zero translators provide 60+ language tours at major attractions, raising visitor satisfaction to 4.9/5.

items.title: Public service counters
items.description: Police departments and hospitals use T1 devices for multilingual intake, improving efficiency by 30%.
